event: BMC is re-incorporated in Delaware and goes public with an initial public offering.
BMC announces its acquisition by a group of major private equity investment groups for $6.9 billion.
BMC is acquired by KKR from a private investor group led by Bain Capital Private Equity and Golden Gate Capital.
Ayman Sayed is named as President and CEO of BMC Software.
The acquisition process is completed and BMC is no longer publicly traded.
